name: Verify specific user is returned in the users response
fullName: Users Endpoint: Verify specific user is returned in the users response
description:
As a developer

  That the Users Endpoint is working as expected

steps.name: Given  I do a get to the "users" endpoint
Then  the returned status code is: "200"
And  I see the "users" response contains the user: "John"
